name: 林祐正
objective:
本課程將以 BIM 之觀點，介紹國內外建築資訊模型及建築資訊模型案例，包含建築資訊模型及探討 BIM 之設計與實作，希望學生能夠由設計一個資訊系統開始，瞭解 BIM 建築資訊系統之架構與應用，進而實際開發一個 BIM 相關資訊系統，其內容包括：建築資訊模型營建自動化應用，建築資訊模型實務應用，國內外建築資訊模型案例探討，建築資訊模型元件分析與設計，BIM 程式撰寫，BIM 系統之設計與實作等內容。
Building Information Modeling (BIM) is increasingly important for engineering and management applications, functions and decision-making. The course introduces the BIM use, modeling, design, and development of BIM-related application in the lifecycle of construction projects. The course is a combination of lectures, readings, hands-on exercises, homework assignments and a project. The course allows students to develop a BIM-related application suitable to their own research or professional inteests.
schedule:
1.Building Information Modeling
2.BIM Basics Introduction
3.Parametric modeling
4.Building Information Modeling for collaboration
5.Applications of BIM in Design Phase
6.Application of BIM in Construction Phase
7.Applications of BIM in Operation Phase
8.4D Simulation 
9.Special Topics in BIM
10.Special Speeches in BIM
scorePolicy:
1. 平常成績 (10%)
2. 平時作業 (30%)
3. 期中簡報 (5%) 及期中報告 (25%)
4. 期末簡報 (5%) 及期末報告 (25%)
materials: BIM Handbook: A Guide to Building Information Modeling for Owners, Managers, Designers, Engineers and Contractors (中文第二版)
